newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean 3-yr yields close down on bargain hunting.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean 3-yr yields close down on bargain hunting.

text.p: Yields on three-year corporates ended sharply lower on Thursday as banks and institutions went on buying on bargain hunting, brokers said.
Expectations of fewer new issues next week also helped boost buying sentiment, they said.
Three-month CD yields also fell in line with buoyed sentiment for long-term bonds.
* 3-yr corporates end at 12.08 pct from 12.23 on Wednesday
The three-year corporate bonds fell until the close after opening at 12.18, against Wednesday's closing of 12.23.
They said new issues were estimated at 90 billion won on Friday, compared with 270 billion on Thursday.
Three-month CD yields also slipped in line with buoyed sentiment for long-term bonds.
